Primordial Force.short_description: Fundamental powers or energies from which reality emerges.

Phase State.short_description: Basic conditions or states of matter and energy.

Essential Quality.short_description: Primary attributes or characteristics that define existence.

Cosmic Principle.short_description: Universal laws or foundations governing reality.

Root Substance.short_description: Primary material from which other substances derive.

Dynamic Process.short_description: Fundamental patterns of change and transformation.

Vibrational Mode.short_description: Basic frequencies or patterns of energy manifestation.

Seed Potential.short_description: Germinal forms containing all possible developments.

Essence Type.short_description: Categories of fundamental nature or being.

Power Source.short_description: Origins of energy and causative force.

Constituent Base.short_description: Basic building blocks of reality systems.

Field Generator.short_description: Sources creating areas of influence or effect.

Modal Expression.short_description: Ways in which basic forces manifest in reality.

Causal Factor.short_description: Primary sources of change and effect.

Formative Current.short_description: Flows of energy that shape manifestation.

Essential Nature.short_description: Fundamental character or quality of being.

Creative Force.short_description: Generative powers bringing things into being.

Binding Agent.short_description: Forces that hold reality systems together.

Core Component.short_description: Essential parts forming basis of existence.

Dimensional Key.short_description: Factors determining level or plane of manifestation.

Essential Stream.short_description: Flows of primary qualities or influences.

Root Dynamic.short_description: Basic patterns of movement and change.
